text: @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus! have u heard of it? Guess u haven't about 2x as many dead as in Vietnam in your country. You know the people u swore to protect. How can u 'CELEBRATE" WHILE THOUSANDS are in the hospital right now and u offer them...NOTHING except disrespect. https://t.co/G02faISXuv
